backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing timestamped readings with auto-increment IDs and providing add, list, latest, and DTO conversion utilities plus a simple hello endpoint.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with a features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout with identity login, latest reading display, readings table, manual refresh, and HTTP instructions card.
frontend/src/components/HttpLoggingInstr: Card component showing backend canister HTTP endpoints with copy buttons and status alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, state persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks polling backend for all readings and the latest reading every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styles and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides helpers to format numbers and convert bigint nanosecond timestamps into human‑readable date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors mapped to CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and notes about frontend‑backend canister ID linkage requirements.
